EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up tomorrow in Cincinnati. We look forward to seeing you!
Please also bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Tuesday, March 10, 2015 8:00am - 4:00pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/cincinnati>
Kingsgate Marriott Conference Center at the University of Cincinnati Room 110 151 Goodman Drive Cincinnati, Ohio, 45219
Map and Driving Directions
Parking Information Self-parking is $10 daily. Valet parking is $18 daily.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans) - The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
QUESTIONS? Contact Paul Santos at psantos@pivotal.io <mailto:psantos@pivotal.io> or via cell at 408-425-9302 <tel:(631) 388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/cincinnati>.
